verses.verse: Run ye to and fro <WH7751> through the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and see <WH7200> now, <WH4994> and know, <WH3045> and seek <WH1245> in the broad places <WH7339> thereof, if <WH518> ye can find <WH4672> a man, <WH376> if <WH518> there be <WH3426> any that executeth <WH6213> judgment, <WH4941> that seeketh <WH1245> the truth; <WH530> and I will pardon <WH5545> it.
And though <WH518> they say, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> liveth; <WH2416> surely <WH3651> they swear <WH7650> falsely. <WH8267>

O LORD, <WH3068> are not <WH3808> thine eyes <WH5869> upon the truth? <WH530> thou hast stricken <WH5221> them, but they have not <WH3808> grieved; <WH2342> thou hast consumed <WH3615> them, but they have refused <WH3985> to receive <WH3947> correction: <WH4148> they have made their faces <WH6440> harder <WH2388> than a rock; <WH4480> <WH5553> they have refused <WH3985> to return. <WH7725>

Therefore I <WH589> said, <WH559> Surely <WH389> these <WH1992> are poor; <WH1800> they are foolish: <WH2973> for <WH3588> they know <WH3045> not <WH3808> the way <WH1870> of the LORD, <WH3068> nor the judgment <WH4941> of their God. <WH430>

I will get <WH1980> me unto <WH413> the great men, <WH1419> and will speak unto <WH1696> them; for <WH3588> they <WH1992> have known <WH3045> the way <WH1870> of the LORD, <WH3068> and the judgment <WH4941> of their God: <WH430> but <WH389> these <WH1992> have altogether <WH3162> broken <WH7665> the yoke, <WH5923> and burst <WH5423> the bonds. <WH4147>

Wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> a lion <WH738> out of the forest <WH4480> <WH3293> shall slay <WH5221> them, and a wolf <WH2061> of the evenings <WH6160> shall spoil <WH7703> them, a leopard <WH5246> shall watch <WH8245> over <WH5921> their cities: <WH5892> every one <WH3605> that goeth out <WH3318> thence <WH4480> <WH2007> shall be torn in pieces: <WH2963> because <WH3588> their transgressions <WH6588> are many, <WH7231> and their backslidings <WH4878> are increased. <WH6105>

How <WH335> shall I pardon <WH5545> thee for this? <WH2063> thy children <WH1121> have forsaken <WH5800> me, and sworn <WH7650> by them that are no <WH3808> gods: <WH430> when I had fed them to the full, <WH7646> <WH853> they then committed adultery, <WH5003> and assembled themselves <WH1413> by troops in the harlots <WH2181> houses. <WH1004>
They were <WH1961> as fed <WH2109> horses <WH5483> in the morning: <WH7904> every one <WH376> neighed <WH6670> after <WH413> his neighbor's <WH7453> wife. <WH802>

Shall I not <WH3808> visit <WH6485> for <WH5921> these <WH428> things? saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> and <WH518> shall not <WH3808> my soul <WH5315> be avenged <WH5358> on such <WH834> a nation <WH1471> as this? <WH2088>

Go ye up <WH5927> upon her walls, <WH8284> and destroy; <WH7843> but make <WH6213> not <WH408> a full end: <WH3617> take away <WH5493> her battlements; <WH5189> for <WH3588> they <WH1992> are not <WH3808> the LORD's. <WH3068>
For <WH3588> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> have dealt very treacherously <WH898> <WH898> against me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

They have belied <WH3584> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> It is not <WH3808> he; <WH1931> neither <WH3808> shall evil <WH7451> come <WH935> upon <WH5921> us; neither <WH3808> shall we see <WH7200> sword <WH2719> nor famine: <WH7458>
And the prophets <WH5030> shall become <WH1961> wind, <WH7307> and the word <WH1699> is not <WH369> in them: thus <WH3541> shall it be done <WH6213> unto them.

Wherefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts, <WH6635> Because <WH3282> ye speak <WH1696> <WH853> this <WH2088> word, <WH1697> behold, <WH2009> I will make <WH5414> my words <WH1697> in thy mouth <WH6310> fire, <WH784> and this <WH2088> people <WH5971> wood, <WH6086> and it shall devour <WH398> them.

Lo, <WH2009> I will bring <WH935> a nation <WH1471> upon <WH5921> you from far, <WH4480> <WH4801> O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> it <WH1931> is a mighty <WH386> nation, <WH1471> it <WH1931> is an ancient <WH4480> <WH5769> nation, <WH1471> a nation <WH1471> whose language <WH3956> thou knowest <WH3045> not, <WH3808> neither <WH3808> understandest <WH8085> what <WH4100> they say. <WH1696>
Their quiver <WH827> is as an open <WH6605> sepulcher, <WH6913> they are all <WH3605> mighty men. <WH1368>

And they shall eat up <WH398> thine harvest, <WH7105> and thy bread, <WH3899> which thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> should eat: <WH398> they shall eat up <WH398> thy flocks <WH6629> and thine herds: <WH1241> they shall eat up <WH398> thy vines <WH1612> and thy fig trees: <WH8384> they shall impoverish <WH7567> thy fenced <WH4013> cities, <WH5892> wherein <WH834> thou <WH859> trustedst, <WH982> with the sword. <WH2719>
Nevertheless <WH1571> in those <WH1992> days, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> I will not <WH3808> make <WH6213> a full end <WH3617> with <WH854> you.

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> ye shall say, <WH559> Wherefore <WH8478> <WH4100> doeth <WH6213> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things unto us? then shalt thou answer <WH559> <WH413> them, Like <WH834> as ye have forsaken <WH5800> me, and served <WH5647> strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> in your land, <WH776> so <WH3651> shall ye serve <WH5647> strangers <WH2114> in a land <WH776> that is not <WH3808> yours.
Declare <WH5046> this <WH2063> in the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and publish <WH8085> it in Judah, <WH3063> saying, <WH559>

Hear <WH8085> now <WH4994> this, <WH2063> O foolish <WH5530> people, <WH5971> and without <WH369> understanding; <WH3820> which have eyes, <WH5869> and see <WH7200> not; <WH3808> which have ears, <WH241> and hear <WH8085> not: <WH3808>

Fear <WH3372> ye not <WH3808> me? saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> will ye not <WH3808> tremble <WH2342> at my presence, <WH4480> <WH6440> which <WH834> have placed <WH7760> the sand <WH2344> for the bound <WH1366> of the sea <WH3220> by a perpetual <WH5769> decree, <WH2706> that it cannot <WH3808> pass <WH5674> it: and though the waves <WH1530> thereof toss themselves, <WH1607> yet can they not <WH3808> prevail; <WH3201> though they roar, <WH1993> yet can they not <WH3808> pass over <WH5674> it?
But this <WH2088> people <WH5971> hath <WH1961> a revolting <WH5637> and a rebellious <WH4784> heart; <WH3820> they are revolted <WH5493> and gone. <WH1980>

Neither <WH3808> say <WH559> they in their heart, <WH3824> Let us now <WH4994> fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> that giveth <WH5414> rain, <WH1653> both the former <WH3138> and the latter, <WH4456> in his season: <WH6256> he reserveth <WH8104> unto us the appointed <WH2708> weeks <WH7620> of the harvest. <WH7105>
Your iniquities <WH5771> have turned away <WH5186> these <WH428> things, and your sins <WH2403> have withheld <WH4513> good <WH2896> things from <WH4480> you.

For <WH3588> among my people <WH5971> are found <WH4672> wicked <WH7563> men: they lay wait, <WH7789> as he that setteth <WH7918> snares; <WH3353> they set <WH5324> a trap, <WH4889> they catch <WH3920> men. <WH376>

As a cage <WH3619> is full <WH4392> of birds, <WH5775> so <WH3651> are their houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of deceit: <WH4820> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they are become great, <WH1431> and waxen rich. <WH6238>

They are waxen fat, <WH8080> they shine: <WH6245> yea, <WH1571> they overpass <WH5674> the deeds <WH1697> of the wicked: <WH7451> they judge <WH1777> not <WH3808> the cause, <WH1779> the cause <WH1779> of the fatherless, <WH3490> yet they prosper; <WH6743> and the right <WH4941> of the needy <WH34> do they not <WH3808> judge. <WH8199>

Shall I not <WH3808> visit <WH6485> for <WH5921> these <WH428> things? saith <WH5002> the LORD: <WH3068> shall not <WH3808> my soul <WH5315> be avenged <WH5358> on such <WH834> a nation <WH1471> as this? <WH2088>
A wonderful <WH8047> and horrible thing <WH8186> is committed <WH1961> in the land; <WH776>

The prophets <WH5030> prophesy <WH5012> falsely, <WH8267> and the priests <WH3548> bear rule <WH7287> by <WH5921> their means; <WH3027> and my people <WH5971> love <WH157> to have it so: <WH3651> and what <WH4100> will ye do <WH6213> in the end <WH319> thereof?
